sentences.english: Divide and conquer is an excellent strategy to adopt in this stage.
sentences.chinese: 分而治之是這個階段能採用的一個優秀策略。
這是一種典型的“分而治之”策略。

sentences.english: China is a past-master of divide-and-rule strategies.
sentences.chinese: 一直以來，大陸就善於運用分而治之的策略。

sentences.english: When confronted with the new situation, the Chinese government has fallen back on divide-and-rule tactics.
sentences.chinese: 面對新情況，中國政府求助於分而治之戰術。

sentences.english: Recursive is a kind of programming technique which can realize the divide-and-conquer method naturally.
sentences.chinese: 遞歸是一種自然地實現分而治之解決問題的編程技術。
